title: Do you have a T202 on Ebay?
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: Do you have a T202 on Ebay?
posts.post_content:
I got an Ebay gift certificate for my birthday from the in-laws and was wondering if anybody had any T202s in VGish condition on Ebay.  I don't do much buying in Ebay these days because you never know what you're going to get...but I figure if somebody here is selling, it should be worthwhile!

Take Care,
Geno

I was thinking about putting up a t202 featuring some anonymous cleveland player on the center panel...but that probably would be more fun on this auction board.  (If somebody else doesn't put one up there, I will have to).

Mac --

I was digging through my collection today for what could possibly be a center panel photo of Jamie Moyer...

Cheers,
Geno

I have one that I'd be willing to post up on eBay for sale.

The BIN price would be $79.95 + $5.95 for insured shipping and delivery confirmation.

Chase Ready for the Squeeze Play (Magee / Paskert on the side panels)

Graded SGC 40 VG 3

If you are interested in purchasing the card, let me know and I'll post it up on eBay.

[IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/Sherry%20Magee/ChaseReadyfortheSqueezePlayT202H-2.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/Sherry%20Magee/ChaseReadyfortheSqueezePlayT202H-1.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks, BlueDevil...but I have that one already...

Take Care,
Geno
